content: Update /blog React page (Blog.jsx) to render the exact static HTML structure inside <section id="people-of-eastend-blog"> (h1, intro p, 3 articles, links, time datetime)
Update StaticFallback.jsx blog rendering (noscript + hidden crawlable content) to match the exact snippet structure
Rebuild frontend (yarn build) and restart frontend service
Screenshot /blog on preview URL and confirm it matches the provided snippet
